rev.diff:
Line 30: Line 30:
He then spent a decade in orchestras and bands, studied jazz for a period, taught drums and then attended film school in Wales.<ref name="Poore-biog">{{cite web|url=http://www.davidpoore.com/|title=David Pore - biography|accessdate=2009-06-10}}</ref>
He then spent a decade in orchestras and bands, studied jazz for a period, taught drums and then attended film school in Wales.<ref name="Poore-biog">{{cite web|url=http://www.davidpoore.com/|title=David Pore - biography|accessdate=2009-06-10}}</ref>
â
{{Listen|filename=BritainGoesWild.ogg|title=Britain Goes Wild|description=6 second sample of ''Britain Goes Wild'' by David Poore.|format=[[Ogg]]}}
 
His most notable composition, "Britain Goes Wild", is the theme tune for [[Springwatch|''Springwatch'' and ''Autumnwatch'']]. He also provided the score for [[David Attenborough]]'s ''[[Life In Cold Blood]]''.
His most notable composition, "Britain Goes Wild", is the theme tune for [[Springwatch|''Springwatch'' and ''Autumnwatch'']]. He also provided the score for [[David Attenborough]]'s ''[[Life In Cold Blood]]''.
